Armor.Name: Rugged Clothes
Armor.Description: Torn and tattered this outfit wonâ€™t really give you much protection.

Armor.Name: Chainmail
Armor.Description: Armor of choice for most travelers. It provides some amount of protection, as well as being light weight.

Armor.Name: Bronze Armor
Armor.Description: Armor made out of bronze. Provides some protection from enemies.

Armor.Name: Astro Armor
Armor.Description: The minerals mixed together to create this armor set are said to give it an out of this world look.

Armor.Name: Devastation Armor
Armor.Description: A armor set created from a mix of both Blood and Corrupt minerals, a devastating combination.

Armor.Name: Death's Armor
Armor.Description: It was said that the first Guardian of Death once wore this armor. Bestow a great power by dawning it.

Armor.Name: Guardian Armor
Armor.Description: A armor set acquired after becoming a full fledged Guardian.

Armor.Name: Bronze Heroic Curass
Armor.Description: An armor chest plate forged from bronze. Offers more protection than the typical armor.

Armor.Name: Astro Heroic Curass
Armor.Description: The minerals mixed together to create this armor chest plate give it an out of this world look.

Armor.Name: Devastation Heroic Curass
Armor.Description: An armor chest plate forged from a mix of Blood and Corrupt minerals, a devastating combination.

Armor.Name: King's Heroic Curass
Armor.Description: This armor chest plate is rumored to once be owned by the late King Ruko. Only the greatest of knights may dawn it.

Armor.Name: Guardian Heroic Curass
Armor.Description: An armor chest plate acquired after becoming a full fledged guardian.

Armor.Name: Aditora
Armor.Description: Usually worn under armor. Although on its own it can be a light weight alternative.

Armor.Name: Astro Aditora
Armor.Description: The minerals mixed together to create this chainmail give it an out of this world look.

Armor.Name: Devastation Aditora
Armor.Description: A chainmail created from a mix of Blood and Corrupt Minerals, a devastating combination.

Armor.Name: Dragon's Aditora
Armor.Description: Chainmail armor said to be created by the Naga race. Also claimed to be the lightest in existence.

Armor.Name: Guardian Aditora
Armor.Description: A chainmail acquired after becoming a full fledge Guardian.

Armor.Name: Robe
Armor.Description: This is a robe worn by wizards, it symbolizes they have chosen to study magic.

Armor.Name: Magician's Suit
Armor.Description: A black tie suit, most magicians wear one, no one really understands why though.

Armor.Name: Fae Garments
Armor.Description: A magical robe created by the fae, a highly magical race.

Armor.Name: Elven Garments
Armor.Description: A magical robe created by the elves, a strongest of the magical race.

Armor.Name: Arch Mage Garments
Armor.Description: A magical robe made specifically for Arch Mages, the greatest of all mages.

Armor.Name: Earrings
Armor.Description: A single earring, most people have it just for the looks.

Armor.Name: Bronze Earrings
Armor.Description: A bronze earring. It offer little protection.

Armor.Name: Jade Earrings
Armor.Description: A normal hat made out of straw, said to be a favorite among farmers.

Armor.Name: Mithril Earrings
Armor.Description: A mithril earring. It offer little protection.

Armor.Name: Meteorite Earrings
Armor.Description: A meteorite earring. It offer little protection.

Armor.Name: Blood Earrings
Armor.Description: A normal hat made out of straw, said to be a favorite among farmers.

Armor.Name: Corrupt Earrings
Armor.Description: A corrupt earring. It offer little protection, as well as they have been rumored to cause corruption.

Armor.Name: Death's Earrings
Armor.Description: It was said that the first Guardian of Death use to be a warrior. This earring s rumored to be theres.

Armor.Name: Guardian Earrings
Armor.Description: A earring acquired after becoming a full fledged Guardian.

Armor.Name: Warrior's Earrings
Armor.Description: A pair of earrings given to signify a the user status as a warrior.

Armor.Name: Knight's Earrings
Armor.Description: A pair of earrings given to signify a users status as a knight.

Armor.Name: King's Earrings
Armor.Description: A pair of earrings rumored to be owned and worn by the late King Ruko. Only the greatest of knights may dawn it.

Armor.Name: Golden Earrings
Armor.Description: A normal hat made out of straw, said to be a favorite among farmers.
